subject: feat: add incremental processing support for "feed the chicken"
body:
Add manifest-based tracking to enable resumable batch processing:
- scripts/pending.js: Generates pending batches by comparing manifests
  against extracted commits. Supports --rebuild-manifests flag.
- scripts/manifest-update.js: Updates manifest after batch approval
- processed/<repo>/manifest.json: Tracks processed SHAs (source of truth)
- pending/<repo>/batches/: Generated batches of unprocessed commits only

This allows "feed the chicken" to work correctly even after merging
and starting a new session - only truly new/unprocessed commits will
be presented for review.

Updated EXTRACTION_PLAYBOOK.md with new workflow documentation.
title: add incremental processing support for "feed the chicken"
